text_block_list.text: It's been a few days since Tamamo Cross' Selection Race, but I can't help thinking back about that last exchange we had…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …Yer, a rookie trainer ain't ya? Ya got no experience or even results to yer name, how 'bout resolve?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Believin' in my victory, trainin' me, and winnin' G1s! The resolve ta be th' best in Japan! Do ya really have tha' kinda resolve?!
…believing in her chances at victory, and having that much resolve. At that time, I couldn't comprehend that strength.
choice_data_list: (I want to speak with her properly next time…!)

text_block_list.text: I made up my mind and started searching for Tamamo Cross. I looked all around the academy until I finally made it to the Training Course-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… haa…!
I found Tamamo Cross alone, running deperately, as if she was possessed.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haa… ku, Aaaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haaa… haa… haa… Damnit… This ain't like me…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, yer-
choice_data_list: About before, I wanted to talk-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -I'm sorry about before!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ya went out of yer way and chased after me, tried ta talk to me, and I jus' flipped out on ya. Fer that… I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …I just couldn't take no more. "As it is, you can't win", is probably what they think of me… cuz of my half-assed run.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -cuz of my height, most people one-sidedly underestimate me.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: [That physique is a disadvantage] [Best in Japan is reckless] [Set a more realistic goal], things like that.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Tha's why, I wanted ta prove it at th' Selection Race. That I'mma… Uma Musume that can "Win like hell".

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But… as ya saw earlier. With some lame runnin' I lost, again… I was restricted.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Th' reason I came a knockin' on th' gates of this academy, was cuz I had a dream that I had ta fulfill in th' Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: To do that, just runnin' ain't enough. Winnin', and winnin' like hell! Witha roar o' wind and light, loud enough ta overturn th' heavens.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …Sorry. I wanna practice a bit more. Next time, I'll win th' Selection Race fer sure. That's why-
choice_data_list: If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.
If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …th' heck are ya sayin'? I don't need yer pity, if that's what yer doin'.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Y-ya saw my last race didn't ya?! With tha' lame run… I just got marked as an also-ran!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I talked a big game, but in th' end, it was jus' talk… Even now, I've got… no inkling of what I ought to be doin'…
choice_data_list: Your desire to win, is second to none
Your desire to win, is second to none

text_block_list.text: She was more frustrated than anyone, but also had the strongest desire to win. That quality was much more necessary than being blessed with a good physique.
-Especially if your goal is to win and become Japan's best.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …what? Jus' by seein' me run once, and chattin' with me a bit, how can ya be so sure…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yer… a weird guy.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …Hey, let's move somewhere else. It's startin' ta get cold, and we stand out like a sore thumb just chattin' away here. Sound good?
It felt like Tamamo Cross' mood had lightened a bit. I nodded, and we changed locations.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Just now, ya said that someone like me could win, right?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: If yer willin' to say that much… then prove that I can win.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Honestly, on my own, I feel like I'm at my wit's end. But I wanna win! No matter what…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Tha's why, right now… I'll take my chances with ya.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll see if ya can live up ta yer words, to yer resolve. In exchange, I'll show ya that I'm an Uma Musume tha' can really win.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It'll be one of those "provisional contracts", I'll be troublin' ya until the next Selection Race… I'll show ya-
choice_data_list: I look forward to working with you!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -what I can- wait! So fast! Ya didn't let me finish! Have ya never heard about this thing called th' tempo of a conversation?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Frank, ain't ya?! It's embarassin'!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But, well… thanks! It kinda happened fast, but, I'll be relyin' on ya startin' tomorrow!
And so, following Tamamo Cross' suggestion, we formed a "provisional contract" for her Selection Race revenge match.
The next day, Tamamo Cross' first training day-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -Well then, what's up first? Show me what ya got for me.
I desperately spent last night making a training menu tailored for her in preparation for her Selection Race, which I showed her.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: This…… is a lot of stuff. And it's so detailed…… You didn't make all of this yesterday, did you?
choice_data_list: I was happy to sign a tentative contract.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Frank, ain't ya?! Yer so direct, it's makin' me worry!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But, it's gettin' me fired up. I can tell yer serious too. -Alright, let's get going! No slackin'!
